title: Ust-Kazha
text:
Ust-Kazha () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">selo</a>) and the administrative center of Ust-Kazhinsky Selsoviet, <a href="Krasnogorsky%20District%2C%20Altai%20Krai">Krasnogorsky District</a>, <a href="Altai%20Krai">Altai Krai</a>, <a href="Russia">Russia</a>. The population was 697 as of 2013. There are 16 streets.
Geography.
Ust-Kazha is located 37 km north of <a href="Krasnogorskoye%2C%20Altai%20Krai">Krasnogorskoye</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Novaya Azhinka is the nearest rural locality.
